entry.key:
def test_get_exercises( self, exercises_client: ExercisesClient, function_exercise: ExercisesFixture, function_course: CourseFixture ): query = GetExercisesQuerySchema(course_id=function_course.response.course.id) response = exercises_client.get_exercises_api(query) response_data = GetExercisesResponseSchema.model_validate_json(response.text)
assert_status_code(response.status_code, HTTPStatus.OK) assert_get_exercises_response(response_data, [function_exercise.response])
validate_json_schema(response.json(), response_data.model_json_schema()) def assert_get_exercises_response( get_exercises_response: GetExercisesResponseSchema, create_exercise_responses: list[CreateExerciseResponseSchema] ): """ Проверяет, что ответ на получения списка заданий соответствует ответам на их создание. :param get_exercises_response: :param create_exercise_responses: :return: """ assert_length(get_exercises_response.exercises, create_exercise_responses, "exercises")
for index, create_exercise_response in enumerate(create_exercise_responses): assert_exercise(get_exercises_response.exercises[index], create_exercise_response.exercise) распиши пожалуйста пунктами понятный порядок действий
а обьясни почему при проверки нужно указываить у ошибки details="Exercise not found"

запускаю python -m pytest -k "test_get_file" ошибка self = <tests.files.test_files.TestFiles object at 0x00000205787FF250>, files_client = <clients.files.files_client.FilesClient object at 0x0000020578965D30> function_file = FileFixture(request=CreateFileRequestSchema(filename='5446a07a-8c52-42bf-9461-499b4fd7483a.png', directory='tests', up...s/5446a07a-8c52-42bf-9461-499b4fd7483a.png'), filename='5446a07a-8c52-42bf-9461-499b4fd7483a.png', directory='tests')))
def test_get_file(self, files_client: FilesClient, function_file: FileFixture): response = files_client.get_file_api(function_file.response.file.id) > response_data = GetFileResponseSchema.model_validate_json(response.text) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ E pydantic_core._pydantic_core.ValidationError: 1 validation error for GetFileResponseSchema E file E Field required [type=missing, input_value={'detail': 'Not Found'}, input_type=dict] E For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing
tests\files\test_files.py:29: ValidationError ===================================================================================================== short test summary info ===================================================================================================== FAILED tests/files/test_files.py::TestFiles::test_get_file - pydantic_core._pydantic_core.ValidationError: 1 validation error for GetFileResponseSchema где она и что вызывает эту ошибку
